scripts.test: npm -w frontend test && npm -w backend test
scripts.build: npm -w frontend run build && npm -w backend run build
scripts.py:test: test -d api && cd api && pytest || echo 'api/ missing, skipping'
scripts.dev:demo: DEMO_MODE=true AUTH_PROVIDER=msal VITE_DEMO_MODE=true VITE_AUTH_PROVIDER=msal npm-run-all --parallel start:backend start:frontend
scripts.dev:local: DEMO_MODE=false AUTH_PROVIDER=local JWT_SECRET=devsecret VITE_DEMO_MODE=false VITE_AUTH_PROVIDER=local npm-run-all --parallel start:backend start:frontend
scripts.dev:msal: DEMO_MODE=false AUTH_PROVIDER=msal VITE_DEMO_MODE=false VITE_AUTH_PROVIDER=msal npm-run-all --parallel start:backend start:frontend
